meanings.sent1: He golfs every weekend with his friends.
meanings.sent2: She golfs at the local course to relax.
meanings.sent3: The cat golfs with a tiny club in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: His laughter golfs through the air like a bird in flight.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ball being hit golfs in my ears long after.

meanings.definition: A game played on a large open-air course, in which a small hard ball is struck with a club into a series of small holes in the ground, the object being to use the fewest possible strokes to complete the course.
meanings.sent1: The golfers enjoyed a round of golfs under the sunny sky.
meanings.sent2: Many people find joy in watching golfs on TV.
meanings.sent3: The golfs tournament had a surprise winner - a beginner!
meanings.sent4: Her determination in life was like a golfs game, full of ups and downs.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the golfs course took his breath away every time he visited.
